chief_complaint: Fatigue and rash on the neck for approximately one week
history_of_present_illness: Patient presents with a papulovesicular lesion on his neck that started as a papule two days earlier. The lesion is non-pruritic, but it is associated with significant non-painful swelling and a pressure sensation in the neck. Symptoms began shortly after travel to the United States.
